pymagic.transfer_tools.Web¶

class pymagic.transfer_tools.Web[source]¶

Bases: object

Functions for interacting with files on the Web.

Methods

dl_googl_sheet

Downloads a Google sheet as a .CSV file.

download_file

Downloads a file from a given Url endpoint.
classmethod dl_googl_sheet(gid, gs, chromedriver)[source]¶

Downloads a Google sheet as a .CSV file.

Parameters

  • gid – Id of Google Sheet to download.

  • gs – Id of Google Sheet Tab to download.

  • chromedriver – Chromedriver path to load Selenium from.

Returns

Downloaded Google Sheet tab.

classmethod download_file(sav_dir, url)[source]¶

Downloads a file from a given Url endpoint.

Parameters

  • sav_dir – Filepath to save downloaded file to.

  • url – URL to download file from.

Returns

Downloaded file in directory.
